Kelsey Freeman
==============

[City Council](https://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)
Title: Councilmember
Phone:
360-755-0531

Current Term: January 1, 2024 - December 31, 2027

This is Kelsey Freeman's first term serving as Councilmember for Ward 2. Kelsey grew up in Skagit County and has lived in Burlington for 3 years, where she has enjoyed participating in community events and building relationships with her neighbors. Her professional background is in office administration. In her spare time, she enjoys hiking, reading, and sharing meals with friends and family.

Kelsey Feeman presently serves as a member of the Audit & Finance Committee. Kelsey's top priorities for council decision-making are citizen wellbeing and environmental sustainability.
